content: how would you like to use up your yarn stash and end up with a beautiful project grab your totes of yarn and lets get started this easy to make scraphgan will be made over the course of just a few weeks it will be thick and warm plush all you need is your yarn a hook and a pair of scissors a few simple instructions and off we go join me each week here on beatriceryandesigns com to see the progress pictures and any tips you may need and the weekly prize winners in the beatrice ryan designs cal facebook group post your progress pictures and chat about the fun we are having fun incentives to answer weekly questions in that group setting don t miss out prizes are involved
